text: Lisa Loven Kongsli (born 23 September 1979) is a Norwegian actress. Her first movie roles were in Fatso (2008), Knerten (2009), and The Orheim Company (2012). In 2014, she became well known for her award-nominated role in Force Majeure. Kongsli played Amazon warrior Menalippe in the 2017 movie Wonder Woman, 2017's Justice League, as well as the 2021 director's cut Zack Snyder's Justice League. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian movie actors Category:Norwegian television actors Category:Norwegian stage actors Category:Norwegian voice actors Category:Actors from Oslo
title: Lisa Loven Kongsli
